1-24 characters, support Chinese and English, numbers and some special symbols. \nSpace names cannot be repeated on the same space device.

Open end-to-end encrypted access channel, real-time access anytime and anywhere.
Do not open the Internet channel, will not be able to access the external network environment.
Are you sure to close the Internet channel?
Closing the internet channel will make it impossible to access the external network anytime and anywhere.
The Internet channel is provided by the official space platform of AO.space. Based on end-to-end encryption technology, the platform cannot parse personal data.
AO.space supports users to deploy private space platform, you can switch to the personal private space platform on demand.
Unable to open the Internet channel, please connect the AO.space Server to the Internet and try again

(2) Other situations where it is necessary to enter a security password to verify the administrator's identity.

for understand your rights and obligations. Clicking agree means that you have fully read and accepted the contents of the above agreement. We will use and protect your personal information in strict accordance with the provisions of the terms and provide you with better services.

Hardware device verification needs to be connected to the device through a local area network. Please use your mobile phone to scan the QR code on the computer browser, and make sure that the mobile phone and computer are on the same network.
The secure mailbox is a tool for administrator authentication. After binding, you can use the secure mailbox to reset the security password.

Please confirm on the bound phone.

. Please confirm whether it is you?

later. During the delay period, the binding side operation is rejected, and this modification will not take effect.

* This function can only be set during initialization.
The personal space disk is missing, resulting in the failure to start AO.space. Please insert your personal space disk back and restart AO.space after power off.
If it is confirmed that the data disk cannot be retrieved, refer to the user manual to reset the device.
AO.space did not detect a storage device.\nPlease shutdown and install the disk again.
The personal space storage capacity is the sum of all disk capacities.
Set disk 1 and disk 2 to RAID1 and provide the storage capacity of only one disk.
Disk 1 and disk 2 remain in RAID 1 mode.

You need to set up a primary storage area from which to store important data such as system service data, personal configuration files, and applet installation files. It is a necessary device for the system startup process.
Selecting disk encryption will make the data in your disk unreadable on other people\'s devices, greatly improving data security. It is recommended.
* The disk initialization operation includes a formatting process. All original data on the disk will be cleared. Please confirm.
Initializing disk.\nThis process lasts about 5-10 minutes.\nDo not shutdown or unplug the disk.
Synchronizing necessary data…\nThis process lasts about 5～10 minutes,\nDo not shut down or unplug the disk.
It is recommended that you check the disk condition. You can also replace a new disk for disk initialization after shutdown.
An Error Occurred During Disk Initialization
Unknown Error Occurred During Disk Initialization
AO.space has not completed disk initialization.
You need to either keep your mobile phone under the same LAN as your AO.space device or place your mobile phone near your AO.space device to resume Bluetooth communication.
Failed to enter the disk initialization process.
Are you sure to shutdown the AO.space Server and return to the login page?
Disk initialization failed, please try later.
It is not recommended to complete the M.2 high-speed storage expansion by yourself.
* This operation involves the formatting of the newly added disk. All the original data in the new disk will be cleared. Please confirm.
Disk format failed, please try later.
It is recommended that you check the status of the newly added disks and ensure that they can be used normally.
Go to the 【Space Access Channel】 page, open the Internet channel to use
Current Environment: AO.space Official Space Platform

1. More flexible: multiple deployment methods such as public cloud, private cloud, hybrid cloud, and local server. \n2. More secure: can be deployed on a local server, with autonomous control of all data and permissions. \n3. Personalization: personalized customization development can be carried out as needed to meet different needs of users.

1. More stable: The official space platform of AO.space will provide stable connection and forwarding services throughout the time. \n2. More secure: The official space platform of AO.space will not save or obtain any data of users, so please rest assured to use it. \n3. Faster speed: The official platform of AO.space will continuously optimize performance and automatically select faster forwarding services.
How to Switch to The Platform
How to Switch to A Private Platform
How to switch to The Official Space Platform
1. Download the private space platform software package and install and deploy it according to the operation manual. \nDownload address:

2. Click the \"Switch to Private Space Platform\" button, enter the domain name of the private space platform, and the software service package has been installed on the platform. Click the \"Confirm\" button. \n3. After switching to a private space platform, all user data on the device will not be lost. To switch to a private platform for the first time, you need to register with the private platform and verify the legitimacy of the platform. It can support switching between multiple platforms. Please rest assured to use it.

1. Click the \"Switch to The Official Space Platform\" button, wait for about 10 seconds, and receiving a successful switch reminder indicates that the switch was successful. \n2. Switching environment: The data of the AO.space device will not be lost, and it can support multiple environments to switch back and forth. Please rest assured to use it.

1. After switching to the private space platform, all members on the device will switch to the private space platform. 
2. Members on the device will automatically connect to the new space platform within 180 days of the expiration date of redirection. If redirection is not possible beyond the expiration date, ask the administrator to invite them again before using it. 
3. Users can continue to access the links they previously shared. 
4. The external authorization of the old space platform for the AO.space application installed by the user will be invalid, and the new space platform needs to be used to re authorize the external authorization.

1. After switching to the official space platform, all members on the device will switch to the official space platform; 
2. Members on the device will automatically connect to the new space platform within 180 days of the expiration date of redirection. If redirection is not possible beyond the expiration date, ask the administrator to invite them again before using it. 
3. Users can continue to access the links they previously shared. 
4. The external authorization of the old space platform for the AO.space application installed by the user will be invalid, and the new space platform needs to be used to re authorize the external authorization.
Switch to The Official Space Platform
Successfully switched to the new space platform.
Successfully switched to the official platform.
Space platform switching...\nExpect to wait 10 seconds.

AO.space requires that you grant the following permissions
Storage permissions: Storage privileges need to be acquired to ensure the normal usability of the application.
Camera permissions: You need to acquire camera privileges for binding devices, network settings, sweeping authorized login, and photo upload Avatar functions.
Address book permission: Need to obtain address book permission for importing contacts function.
Location permissions: Location information is required to search for and connect AO.space Server using Bluetooth
